EtOH, belgian Flavors in a bottle: EtOH, belgian Flavors in a bottle
Wij, bij EtOH, hechten belang aan lokale: We, at EtOH, value local cultivation. We use pure ingredients from our beautiful Hageland and process them into delicious drinks.
Wij zijn een team van 4 studenten, elk m: We are a team of 4 students, each with a different education. But how different we may be, we have discovered that our hearts lie here.
Met onze drankjes willen we onze passie: With our drinks, we want to share our passion for local with the whole of Flanders. We want to draw attention to local, pure cultivation. With this project, we want to prove that Belgium has a lot of delicious alcoholic beverages to offer.
